title: I try to open lol, I can't.
body: I play on mac. Normally I click on it. Normally, the logo jumps and a little black dot appears saying that the app is open. Now It jumps and the crash window opens. Thanks for the help!

replies.body: A connection issue might be struggling to reach the patching server, so it's failing to load the patcher.  Start off with the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, just make sure to use the instructions specific to Mac.  Let me know if you run into any issues!
This is my first post ever haha but yeah I'm experiencing the exact same thing here. I was playing just fine yesterday! I'll update here if I get LoL up and running again.
After goofing around, I got it! If you wanna play a couple games since you seem chill. Add me! (We're both NA)
So kind of you to share your results! I tried but it didn't work. I will try other things. Thank you so much.
Hiya! I just wanted to say that a quick reboot did it for me. Computer restarted, clicked the LoL client and it opened this time! I was able to login no problem. I hope this helps.
